translations: 擦洗，刷洗；<非正式>取消（原有安排）（scrub 的第三人称单数）

sentences.sentence: Avoid over washing or using harsh scrubs;
sentences.translation: 不过度清洗或用力刮擦;

sentences.sentence: A woman in scrubs steered a gurney around us.
sentences.translation: 一个上了面部磨砂的女人推着轮床在我身边走过。

sentences.sentence: Only gentle scrubs and exfoliators can be used every day.
sentences.translation: 只有温和的去角质产品可以天天用。
